Class TransactionStatistic

java.lang.Object
Skeleton.Statistic
TransactionStatistic
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<Object>
public class TransactionStatistic extends Statistic
A specialized statistic class that tracks transaction values and calculates the average value per transaction. Extends the base Statistic class and adds tracking for total value and transaction count. Thread-safe via synchronization for multi-threaded environments.

  • Method Details

    • recordTransaction

      public void recordTransaction(double value)
      Records a new transaction by adding its value to the total and incrementing the count. Also stores the value in the base class for generic use.
      Parameters:
      value - the value of the transaction to record

    • summarize

      public float summarize()
      Calculates and returns the average value per transaction. If no transactions have occurred, returns 0.
      Specified by:
      summarize in class Statistic
      Returns:
      average transaction value
